sentence: It  took  only  a  few  hours  to  move  the  first  patients  underground  on  Oct.  7,  when  Hamas-backed  militants  crossed  from  the  Gaza  Strip  into  southern  Israel,  killing  more  than  1,400  people  and  taking  over  240  hostages,  according  to  Israeli  officials.

In  the  month  since,  Israel  has  bombarded  Gaza,  run  by  Hamas,  killing  more  than  10,000  Palestinians  and  damaging  overcrowded  hospitals  there,  according  to  Gaza's  Health  Ministry.
